textAfterTable: Women's Sizing   X-Small Small Medium Large X-Large Size 2 4-6 8-10 12-14 16-18 Bust 32.5 in 33.5-34.5 in 35.5-36.5 in 38-39.5 in 41-43 in Waist 24 in 25-26 in 27-28 in 29.5-31 in 32.5-34.5 in Hips 35 in 36-37 in 38-39 in 40.5-42 in 43.5-45.5 in Inseam 30.5-31.5 in 30.75-31.75 in 31-32 in 31.25-32.25 in 31.5-32.5 in Apparel Sizing Tips: Use these tips as a general guide when finding your measurements: Chest/Bust: With your arms at your sides, measure around the fullest part of your chest, across shoulder blades and under arms. Waist: To measure your natural waistline, wrap the tape so it intersects your navel. Keep tape flat, but comfortably loose. Hips: Stand with your heels together and measure the fullest part of your hips. Make sure the measuring tape is level all the way around your body. Inseam: Stand up straight, and start the tape measure high in your crotch. Straighten the tape down the inside of your leg to the bottom of your ankle.
